FlowDefinition.description: This action creates a new QuoteLineItem record and adds it to an existing Quote. Before calling this Action, find the 18-digit Product ID based on the Product Name specified by the User using Action QueryRecords. Before calling this Action, find the 18-digit Quote ID based on the Quote Number or Quote Name specified by the User using Action QueryRecords.
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Agentforce Quoting - Add Quote Line Item to Quote
